revised_title: Investigations on the Spectrum of Selenium: Part I - Se IV and Se V
tldr: The authors investigated the spectrum of selenium to analyze the spectra of the atom at different stages of ionization and determine the energy levels characteristic of each. They studied the spark spectrum of selenium, observing lines mainly with strong discharges through selenium vapor in vacuum tubes. The authors identified the spectra of Se IV and Se V and provided a term scheme for Se IV, contributing to the understanding of selenium's atomic structure.
